name: Universal Battle brawl (early access)
description:
A game where 2 little people have a friendly duel 

Instructions;

player one:

W,A,S,D to move

 E for attack one  and Q for attack 2

player two

arrow keys to move

L for attack one and  K for attack two

1,2,3,4, and 5 could be used to change the level.

and R could choose a random map
